title: D.C. Circuit Upholds Presidential Removal of MSPB and NLRB Members
description: On Monday, the Supreme Court will hear oral argument in Trump v. Slaughter, the case challenging limitations on the President's ability to remove members of the Federal Trade Commission. In resolving this question, the Court will consider whether to narrow or…
